title: HOW TO BUILD THINGS THAT MATTER
summary:
Building software that changes lives is hard work. This talk will focus
on three important concepts that you can use to identify problems, solve
them, and get feedback on your solutions as soon as possible. The focus
will be on why Django matters in this process, and what Django does for
you as a creator to speed up this process.

Help us caption & translate this video!
